The Challenge Network
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for attending the assessment at The Challenge. We very much enjoyed meeting you and I am pleased to offer you the role of {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c}. This role is dependant on the receipt of a satisfactory enhanced CRB check. Please reply to this email to confirm your acceptance of this offer and your attendance at your training session as soon as possible.
TRAINING Role specific training will take place from the 18th to the 20th of June (details of additional training dates will be provided shortly). The 18th and 19th will be in Birmingham and the 20th in your regional TCN office. During training, you will learn all you need to know about The Challenge and your role. You will also meet the people that you will be working with this summer. Please note that accommodation and travel will be provided for those travelling to Birmingham from London and the North West. The details of times and venues will follow in due course. Please contact me on the email address below if there are any problems.
WORK DATES
The role lasts from {!Job_Application__c.00NC0000005EnMk} to 05/10/2012
All clusters except HEK, MAK and Micro The first part of the role is residential, from 01/07/2012 until 29/09/2012. Days off: 3rd, 8th, 13th, 18th, 23th, 27th July Days off: 2nd, 7th, 12th, 17th, 22rd, 28th August
There is then a break from 30th August to 5th September inclusive. The second part of the role, from 6th September to 5th October, is based in The Challenge office. You will work from Thursday to Monday each week and have Tuesdays and Wednesdays off. Days off: 11th, 12th, 18th, 19th, 25th, 26th September Days off: 2nd and 3rd October
HEK The first part of the role is residential, from 06/07/2012 until 19/09/2012. Days off: 8th, 13th, 18th, 23th, 27th July Days off: 2nd, 7th, 12th, 17th
There is then a break from 20th August to 5th September inclusive. The second part of the role, from 6th September to 5th October, is based in The Challenge office. You will work from Thursday to Monday each week and have Tuesdays and Wednesdays off. Days off: 11th, 12th, 18th, 19th, 25th, 26th September Days off: 2nd and 3rd October

There is then a break from 20th August to 5th September inclusive. The second part of the role, from 6th September to 5th October, is based in The Challenge office. You will work from Thursday to Monday each week and have Tuesdays and Wednesdays off. Days off: 11th, 12th, 18th, 19th, 25th, 26th September Days off: 2nd and 3rd October
Micro These details will be communicated in a separate email.
HOLIDAY All except HEK, MAK and Micro: There are 27 days holiday during the fourteen-week period. HEK: There are 34 days holiday during the thirteen week period (pay will be adjusted accordingly) MAK: There are 35 days holiday during the fourteen week period (pay will be adjusted accordingly)
Micro: These details will be communicated in a separate email.
ROLE DETAILS All meals and accommodation are provided during the nine-week residential part of the programme, but not during the community part of the programme. Before the summer you will need to apply for a pre-paid card to buy essential items with. You will need to bring your passport number or driving licence number to training to apply for it. You will have Â£1,000 electronically transferred to your personal account prior to the start of the summer programme and you will need to transfer this money to your pre-paid card. More details will be provided at training.
CRB Your role is subject to a enhanced CRB or List 99 check. We will require scanned documents from you in order to process this. Please go to Care Check ID Requirements for information on which documents are needed. It is very important that you send scanned copies of your documents as soon as possible as your role with us is dependant on a satisfactory CRB.
In order to apply for your CRB, please follow these instructions. Please note that you do not need to enter a password.
Visit www.carecheck.co.uk Click on the Applicant tab Please read all the notes and instructions Click on Click here to continue Click on Criminal Records Bureau (CRB) Application Form Click on Start a New Application Enter the Organisation Reference: evolutionrecruitment Enter your personal information to apply for the CRB check.
Please submit your documents for verification on the below form. We also request that you submit your dietary requirements and any medical information (such as allergies) that we need to know about, so that we can cater for you during training and during your role on The Challenge.
